attributes.action: NO Green Paper "Transforming Children & Young People's Mental Health Provision"
attributes.additional_details:
HERE IS A GOOD LINK FOR SHORT READING WITH A FURTHER TO FULL GREEN PAPER:  https://goo.gl/ZtBeQW

A large body of evidence proves addition to Pharmaceutical drugs & "Mental Health" drugs causes untold harm.  Evidence compiled by reputable sources can be supplied. "Lead" for Mental Health is Psychiatry, a psuedo-science with very little provable evidence of success.  Would result increasing Millions of those below 25 years of age will also be pulled into "involuntary drug addiction." We say NO.
attributes.background: HIDDEN VALUES:  The recent and on-going December 2017 Gov Green Paper, titled:  Transforming Children and Young People's Mental Health Provision - demonstrates the hold which Parmaceutical Lobby and Psychiatry have over our Dept. of Health and Education for the 'BIG MONEY" over "Good Health"

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government is currently consulting on the Green Paper. You can find out how to have your say here:

https://engage.dh.gov.uk/youngmentalhealth/
